definition: warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if

sentences.english: She is absent pamper, also nurturance the habit that gets along with the person of different type.
sentences.chinese: 她不在嬌縱，也養成了和不同類型的人相處的習慣。

sentences.english: I knew when I married you that you were selfish and spoiled.
sentences.chinese: 我知道當我們結婚的時候你是多麼的自私和嬌縱。

sentences.english: Over the past years, he babied his wife too much.
sentences.chinese: 過去多年來他過分嬌縱他的太座。

sentences.english: She was babied by all hands.
sentences.chinese: 她受到大家的嬌縱偏愛。

sentences.english: The dividing-line between permissiveness and sheer negligence is very fine indeed.
sentences.chinese: 嬌縱和放手不管之間的界線是很微妙的。
